compounddef.title: Creating a Discord Bot
compounddef.innerpage: Building a discord bot in Windows
Building a Discord Bot using CMake/UNIX

detaileddescription.para: If you are wanting to build a bot using C++, you're in the right place! The fast and easy tutorials below will guide you through how to build a bot using the D++ library on either a UNIX-like (e.g. Linux) system with CMake or in Windows with Visual Studio 2019.
Click a link below for a guide on your system of choice:

para.ref: Building a discord bot in Windows
Building a Discord Bot using CMake/UNIX
